name: Organization Structure
description: Organizational structure and hierarchy that defines roles, responsibilities, and reporting relationships for HIPAA compliance. Includes designations of responsibility and authority levels.

name: Governance Framework
description: System of rules, procedures, and practices that direct and control organizational activities related to HIPAA compliance. Includes policies, governance committees, and decision-making processes.

name: Board of Directors Oversight
description: Board-level oversight and governance responsibility for HIPAA compliance. Board must establish and monitor compliance program, receive reports, and ensure adequate resources.

name: Executive Management
description: Senior management responsible for implementing HIPAA policies, allocating resources, and ensuring organization-wide compliance. Includes C-suite oversight and strategic direction.

name: Privacy Office
description: Dedicated office/function responsible for overseeing privacy compliance. Manages privacy notices, authorizations, individual requests, and privacy incident response.

name: Security Office
description: Dedicated office/function responsible for security compliance including access controls, encryption, audit logging, and security incident response.

name: Compliance Office
description: Dedicated office/function responsible for overall HIPAA compliance program management, audit procedures, sanctions, and compliance monitoring.

name: Compliance Officer Role
description: Defined role responsible for compliance program development, implementation, and oversight. Reports to executive leadership. Authority to implement policies.

name: Privacy Officer Role
description: Defined role responsible for privacy compliance including policy development, privacy notices, authorization management, and individual rights fulfillment.

name: Security Officer Role
description: Defined role responsible for security safeguards implementation including technical controls, access management, and security monitoring.

name: Compliance Committee
description: Committee structure for coordinating compliance activities across organization. Includes representatives from privacy, security, operations, and compliance functions.

name: Incident Response Team
description: Designated team responsible for responding to security incidents and breaches. Includes investigation, mitigation, notification, and post-incident review procedures.

name: Policy Development Process
description: Standardized process for developing, approving, implementing, and maintaining HIPAA compliance policies. Includes version control, stakeholder review, and documentation.

name: Change Management Procedures
description: Procedures for managing changes to systems, processes, or policies affecting HIPAA compliance. Includes impact assessment, testing, and approval requirements.

name: Budget Allocation for Compliance
description: Designated budget allocation for HIPAA compliance activities including safeguards implementation, training, audits, and incident response capabilities.

name: Workforce Engagement Strategy
description: Strategy for engaging workforce in HIPAA compliance including communication, training, reporting mechanisms, and accountability measures.
